welcome.title: Welcome to Denariiâ€™s Rewards Program
welcome.description: Here you can stake your ARI Liquidity tokens in order to receive your rewards. You can also claim your ARI tokens and exit at any time. Simply connect your wallet, and select the pool you have already added liquidity to and stake your tokens.

walletConnection.title: Please connect a wallet with your ARI holdings to start:

success.title: Select Wallet
success.subtitle: Please select the wallet you would like to use with ARI Rewards Dashboard

loading.connectInstructions: Please follow the prompts on your device to unlock your wallet.

error.title: Error
error.subtitle: ARI Rewards Dashboard couldn't access your wallet.

intro.title: What would you like to do?

burn.title: Burn
burn.description: Burn sUSD to unlock staked ARI

claim.title: Claim
claim.description: Claim rewards from ARI staking and Synth exchanges

action.title: Mint
action.subtitle: Mint sUSD by staking your ARI. This gives you a Collateralization Ratio and a debt, allowing you to earn staking rewards.
action.instruction: Confirm or enter amount to mint:

action.title: Burn
action.subtitle: Burn sUSD to unlock your staked ARI. This increases your Collateralization Ratio and reduces your debt, allowing you to transfer your non-escrowed ARI.
action.instruction: Confirm or enter amount to burn:

action.title: Claim
action.subtitle: If you have staked your ARI and minted sUSD, you are eligible to collect two kinds of rewards: ARI staking rewards, and Synth exchange rewards generated on Synthetix.Exchange.
action.note: Note: if not collected within 7 days, your rewards will be forfeited and rolled over into the fee pool.

action.title: Track
action.subtitle: Track your debt over time, with charts via

action.title: Trade
action.subtitle: Trade your Synths for sUSD. For the full dApp, which allows you to trade between any Synths, use Synthetix.Exchange.

action.title: Transfer
action.subtitle: Transfer your ETH, ARI or Synths.

intro.title: Available for sale:
intro.subtitle: Deposit sUSD into a queue to be sold for ETH. You can withdraw your sUSD at any time while waiting. Note: minimum deposit is 50 sUSD.

staking.title: Vest your ARI staking rewards in escrow
staking.subtitle: If you have staked your ARI and minted sUSD, you are eligible to receive ARI staking rewards, which you can vest here after they have been escrowed for 12 months.

tokenSale.title: Vest your escrowed ARI from the token sale
tokenSale.subtitle: If your ARI is still escrowed from the token sale, you can vest it here.

locked.subtitle: First approve the Unipool contract to transfer your ARI-ETH UNI-V2 tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your UNI-V2 Liquidity Provider (LP) tokens, claim ARI rewards, or exit completely.

locked.subtitle: First approve the Unipool contract to transfer your ARI-USDC-DAI UNI-V2 tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your Balancer Liquidity Provider (LP) tokens, claim ARI rewards, or exit completely.

popup.title: Delegate wallet addresses
popup.description: Delegation enables a wallet to execute functions on behalf of another wallet: mint, burn, claim, and exchange, but not transfer.

input.label: Enter new wallet address to delegate:

transactionSettings.title: Set gas price
transactionSettings.subtitle: Adjust the gas price (GWEI) below to set the transaction speed.

confirmation.title: Please confirm transaction
confirmation.subtitle: To continue, follow the prompts on your <1>walletType</1> Wallet.

complete.subtitle: Your transaction has been broadcast to the Ethereum network. You may close this window as the transaction will complete in the background.

error.notEnoughToMint: You cannot currently mint that much sUSD
error.notEnoughToBurn: You do not have that much sUSD to burn. You can find the best rate on dex.ag to buy more.

maintenance.title: ARI Rewards Dashboard is currently unavailable due to upgrades.
maintenance.subtitle: Sorry for the inconvenience, it will be back shortly.

mobileLanding.title: ARI Rewards Dashboard is currently unavailable for mobile and tablet.
mobileLanding.subtitle: We hope to have a mobile version available in the next few months.

tooltip.claim: To claim rewards, you must be within 1% of the Target Collateralization Ratio. If you are below this figure, you will be blocked from claiming rewards until you burn enough sUSD.
tooltip.debtBalance: Your debt begins as the amount of sUSD you initially mint, and fluctuates according to gains or losses made by other Synth holders. Any time someone holds a Synth that appreciates in value, that gain is distributed proportionally between all the staked ARI holdersâ€™ debts. To unlock all your staked ARI, you must first pay off your debt.
tooltip.synthsBalance: Synths are the synthetic assets in the Synthetix system, including sUSD, sBTC, iBTC, and all of the other assets available at Synthetix.Exchange. This figure is the total value of all the Synths held in this wallet. If you wish to convert some Synths back into sUSD, click the TRADE button.
tooltip.track: <0>Issued debt:</0> This displays the total of all your mints and burns over time, revealing how only your C-Ratio management has affected your debt.<1 /><2>Actual debt:</2> This displays your total debt over time.
tooltip.poolCompleted: This incentive is now completed. Please collect any rewards accrued and withdraw your tokens.
